description:
Mad Max (1979)
In the near future, the fuel that powers the car engines is also reason to crimes perpetrated by violent gangs. Max is a young cop and along with his fellow patrol the roads to prevent the action of those who insist on disturbing the peace. The death of a member by the hands of Max begins a series of cruel crimes committed against your family and best friends. So Max has only one choice: revenge.

Mad Max 2: The Road Warrior (1981)
The race for oil has led to a war between world powers of catastrophic proportions. Cities collapsed. The planet becomes a lonely and lawless land. The remaining, motorized hooligans traveling without control in a barren land, searching the scarcest well, gasoline. Who owns has control of this wasteland. This is the society of the future and thereby vague Max a man aimlessly mulling over the pain of her past after losing his family and the police partner. Max follows for the land in its powerful V8 Ford Falcon poisoned traveling the roads indifferent to danger.

Mad Max - Beyond Thunderdome (1985)
After the destruction of civilization arises Bartertown, a city in the desert with primitive rules and deadly that has a ruler (Tina Turner) who want to consolidate their power at any price. Until there comes Max (Mel Gibson), who is forced to join a fight, and for refusing to kill his opponent has just been banned in the desert. Until a group of young wild and pass the saving to consider him a messiah that will take them to a new land.
